select * from TB_ACTIVITY_PROFIT a left join TB_ACTIVITY_QUOTA_RULE b on a.UUID = b.ACTIVITY_ID and if(length(b.IS_ENABLE), b.IS_ENABLE,'1')= '1' where if(length(a.IS_ENABLE), a.IS_ENABLE,'1') = '1'
and (if(length(a.APPLY_PRODUCT_FLAG), APPLY_PRODUCT_FLAG,'0') = '1' or EXISTS (select 1 from TB_ACTIVITY_REF_PRODUCT b where b.ACTIVITY_ID=a.UUID and b.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
and (if(length(a.ENTRUST_WAY_SET), ENTRUST_WAY_SET,'*') = '*' or instr(ENTRUST_WAY_SET, #{entrustWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0)
and (if(length(a.CLIENT_TYPE_SET), CLIENT_TYPE_SET,'*') = '*' or or instr(CLIENT_TYPE_SET, #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0)
and if(length(a.BANK_CODE_SET), BANK_CODE_SET,'*') = '*' and if(length(a.PAY_TYPE_SET), PAY_TYPE_SET,'*') = '*' and ALLOW_USE_BEGIN_DATE <= sysdate() and a.ALLOW_USE_END_DATE >= sysdate() and (ifnull(b.PER_DATE_MAX_AMOUNT,999999999)>=999999999 or b.PER_DATE_MAX_AMOUNT > (select sum(ifnull(c.Profit_Value, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_TAKE_IN_ACTIVITY c where BUSIN_CODE = '5003' and c.ACTIVITY_ID = a.UUID and c.create_time >= curdate())) and (ifnull(b.Max_Amount,999999999)>=999999999 or b.Max_Amount > (select sum(ifnull(c.Profit_Value, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_TAKE_IN_ACTIVITY c where BUSIN_CODE = '5003' and c.ACTIVITY_ID = a.UUID)) and (ifnull(b.Per_Date_Max_Count,999999999)>=999999999 or b.Per_Date_Max_Count > (select sum(ifnull(c.Product_Count, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_TAKE_IN_ACTIVITY c where BUSIN_CODE = '5003' and c.ACTIVITY_ID = a.UUID and c.create_time >= curdate())) and (ifnull(b.Max_Count,999999999)>=999999999 or b.Max_Count > (select sum(ifnull(c.Product_Count, 0)) from TB_CLIENT_TAKE_IN_ACTIVITY c where BUSIN_CODE = '5003' and c.ACTIVITY_ID = a.UUID)) Order by a.CREATE_TIME desc
